reviewText: Keeps kid's attention and helps them learn letters and spelling.  Nothing bad about that.
Our son really likes the Wordworld dvds. This is probably his favorite. Catchy songs and interesting characters.
The dvd came quickly. The grandchildren love it.
My 2 year old grandson loves all the animals and sings along when they get ready to "build a word"

This DVD contains 8 episodes from the Wordworld cartoon. Amazon doesn't always do a good job on their DVD episode listings so here are the episodes that are included on this DVD:

1. Hide and Seek
2. Play Ball!
3. Get Your Coat
4. The Really Red Ruby
5. Shuffleword
6. M is for Map
7. Runaway O
8. Sheep's First Bike Ride
we love these videos! great for my preschooler
grandson loves it
met expectations
Good
Cant find these in stores GREAT Item

The characters are lively and cheerful. The story is easy to follow and good for kids. Above all, I highly appreciate that it has English subtitles!! As a non-native speaker, without English subtitles, it's sometimes hard to follow the story. I'm thinking of getting another series of this.
My 19 month old LOVES Word World. I had to get a dvd for traveling purposes (or when I just need her to sit still for an hour).
My kids love it

I stumbled on this series by accident.  I bought the valentine one for my grandson for valentine's day and he loves loves it.  Therefore,
I started looking for more and Amazon came through once again.  I gave him this as a gift when his baby brother was born last month.  It also is a hit.  Very catchy songs, the animals are cute as can be.
Word world is amazing!!
I did not use the DVD right away, when I used it then I found out that it was not working. Cant return since it is too late. =(
Fantastic!
Very educational, they give your children the ability to spell and recognize words, it helps them form complete sentences.
We love all of the Word World DVDs!
My grandson loves it, its perfect for 3 yr olds.
Great dvd!
I purchas.ed this DVD for my nephew and he watches it, but has moved on to another series of cartoons
my son and grandson love these videos
Bought this as a gift for a 3 year old and 16 month old. They love it.
